meanings.definition: The state or quality of being a dimer
meanings.sent1: The dimerisms of the molecule were crucial for its stability.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the dimerisms of the protein structure.
meanings.sent3: The dimerisms of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: The dimerisms of the twins were so striking that they often confused people.
meanings.sent5: The dimerisms of the flower petals created a beautiful symmetry.

meanings.definition: The presence of two similar or identical parts or elements
meanings.sent1: The dimerisms in the design gave it a balanced look.
meanings.sent2: The dimerisms of the equation made it easier to solve.
meanings.sent3: The dimerisms in the recipe called for equal amounts of sugar and flour.
meanings.sent4: The dimerisms of the melody created a harmonious sound.
meanings.sent5: The dimerisms in the painting added depth and interest.
